description.sword-shield:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

effect.full: Transfers the user's held item to the target.  If the user has no held item, or the target already has a held item, this move will fail.
effect.shortEffect: Gives the user's held item to the target.
